channel.title: I'm still having trouble
channel.description:
Hello all. I have been lurking the Moparscape forums for the past week or so reading threads and trying to figure things out for myself. I have downloaded probably a dozen sources and clients. I can't get any of them to work.
I'm not trying to start a server, or host anything, or build webclients. I am just interested in an offline version of RSC that i can mess around with and have admin controls. I have read many guides, and tutorials. I just don't understand... especially the sections that deal with changing the code in Java.
I guess I am asking for something that is idiot-proof. Use pictures, bright colors, and sock puppets if you want. Insult my intelligence, I don't care. I just want to play RSC by my self.
